query:
-- IoT 3D Models
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_3d_models (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  category ENUM('machine','equipment','building','zone','furniture','custom') DEFAULT 'machine',
  model_url VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  model_format ENUM('gltf','glb') DEFAULT 'glb',
  thumbnail_url VARCHAR(500),
  file_size INT,
  default_scale DECIMAL(10,4) DEFAULT 1.0000,
  default_rotation_x DECIMAL(10,4) DEFAULT 0,
  default_rotation_y DECIMAL(10,4) DEFAULT 0,
  default_rotation_z DECIMAL(10,4) DEFAULT 0,
  bounding_box_width DECIMAL(10,4),
  bounding_box_height DECIMAL(10,4),
  bounding_box_depth DECIMAL(10,4),
  manufacturer VARCHAR(100),
  model_number VARCHAR(100),
  tags JSON,
  metadata JSON,
  is_public TINYINT DEFAULT 0,
  is_active TINYINT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  uploaded_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_3d_model_category (category),
  INDEX idx_3d_model_active (is_active),
  INDEX idx_3d_model_public (is_public)
);

-- IoT 3D Model Instances
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_3d_model_instances (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  model_id INT NOT NULL,
  floor_plan_3d_id INT NOT NULL,
  device_id INT,
  machine_id INT,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  position_x DECIMAL(10,4) NOT NULL,
  position_y DECIMAL(10,4) NOT NULL,
  position_z DECIMAL(10,4) NOT NULL,
  rotation_x DECIMAL(10,4) DEFAULT 0,
  rotation_y DECIMAL(10,4) DEFAULT 0,
  rotation_z DECIMAL(10,4) DEFAULT 0,
  scale_x DECIMAL(10,4) DEFAULT 1.0000,
  scale_y DECIMAL(10,4) DEFAULT 1.0000,
  scale_z DECIMAL(10,4) DEFAULT 1.0000,
  visible TINYINT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  opacity DECIMAL(3,2) DEFAULT 1.00,
  wireframe TINYINT DEFAULT 0,
  cast_shadow TINYINT DEFAULT 1,
  receive_shadow TINYINT DEFAULT 1,
  clickable TINYINT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  tooltip VARCHAR(255),
  popup_content TEXT,
  animation_enabled TINYINT DEFAULT 0,
  animation_type ENUM('none','rotate','pulse','bounce','custom') DEFAULT 'none',
  animation_speed DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 1.00,
  metadata JSON,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_3d_instance_model (model_id),
  INDEX idx_3d_instance_floor (floor_plan_3d_id),
  INDEX idx_3d_instance_device (device_id),
  INDEX idx_3d_instance_machine (machine_id)
);

-- IoT Technician Notification Preferences
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_technician_notification_prefs (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  technician_id INT NOT NULL,
  push_enabled TINYINT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  push_token TEXT,
  push_platform ENUM('web','android','ios') DEFAULT 'web',
  sms_enabled TINYINT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  phone_number VARCHAR(20),
  phone_country_code VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT '+84',
  email_enabled TINYINT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100),
  notify_new_work_order TINYINT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  notify_assigned TINYINT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  notify_status_change TINYINT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  notify_due_soon TINYINT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  notify_overdue TINYINT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  notify_comment TINYINT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  min_priority_for_push ENUM('low','medium','high','critical') DEFAULT 'medium',
  min_priority_for_sms ENUM('low','medium','high','critical') DEFAULT 'high',
  quiet_hours_enabled TINYINT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  quiet_hours_start VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT '22:00',
  quiet_hours_end VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT '07:00',
  last_push_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  last_sms_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  last_email_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_notif_pref_technician (technician_id)
);

-- IoT Work Order Notifications
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_work_order_notifications (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  work_order_id INT NOT NULL,
  technician_id INT NOT NULL,
  notification_type ENUM('new_work_order','assigned','status_change','due_soon','overdue','comment','escalation') NOT NULL,
  channel ENUM('push','sms','email') NOT NULL,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  message TEXT NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('pending','sent','delivered','failed','read') DEFAULT 'pending',
  sent_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  delivered_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  read_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  failed_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  failure_reason TEXT,
  external_message_id VARCHAR(100),
  metadata JSON,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_wo_notif_work_order (work_order_id),
  INDEX idx_wo_notif_technician (technician_id),
  INDEX idx_wo_notif_status (status),
  INDEX idx_wo_notif_type (notification_type),
  INDEX idx_wo_notif_created (created_at)
);

-- IoT SMS Config
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_sms_config (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  provider ENUM('twilio','nexmo','aws_sns') DEFAULT 'twilio',
  account_sid VARCHAR(100),
  auth_token VARCHAR(100),
  from_number VARCHAR(20),
  max_sms_per_day INT DEFAULT 100,
  max_sms_per_hour INT DEFAULT 20,
  cooldown_minutes INT DEFAULT 5,
  is_enabled TINYINT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  last_tested_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  test_result TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

-- IoT Push Config
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_push_config (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  provider ENUM('firebase','onesignal','pusher') DEFAULT 'firebase',
  project_id VARCHAR(100),
  server_key TEXT,
  vapid_public_key TEXT,
  vapid_private_key TEXT,
  is_enabled TINYINT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  last_tested_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  test_result TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

-- IoT MTTR/MTBF Statistics
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_mttr_mtbf_stats (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  target_type ENUM('device','machine','production_line') NOT NULL,
  target_id INT NOT NULL,
  period_type ENUM('daily','weekly','monthly','quarterly','yearly') NOT NULL,
  period_start TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  period_end TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  mttr DECIMAL(10,2),
  mttr_min DECIMAL(10,2),
  mttr_max DECIMAL(10,2),
  mttr_std_dev DECIMAL(10,2),
  mtbf DECIMAL(12,2),
  mtbf_min DECIMAL(12,2),
  mtbf_max DECIMAL(12,2),
  mtbf_std_dev DECIMAL(12,2),
  mttf DECIMAL(12,2),
  availability DECIMAL(5,4),
  total_failures INT DEFAULT 0,
  total_repairs INT DEFAULT 0,
  total_downtime_minutes INT DEFAULT 0,
  total_uptime_hours DECIMAL(12,2) DEFAULT 0,
  corrective_work_orders INT DEFAULT 0,
  preventive_work_orders INT DEFAULT 0,
  predictive_work_orders INT DEFAULT 0,
  emergency_work_orders INT DEFAULT 0,
  total_labor_cost DECIMAL(12,2) DEFAULT 0,
  total_parts_cost DECIMAL(12,2) DEFAULT 0,
  total_maintenance_cost DECIMAL(12,2) DEFAULT 0,
  calculated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_mttr_mtbf_target (target_type, target_id),
  INDEX idx_mttr_mtbf_period (period_type, period_start),
  INDEX idx_mttr_mtbf_calculated (calculated_at)
);

-- IoT Failure Events
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_failure_events (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  target_type ENUM('device','machine','production_line') NOT NULL,
  target_id INT NOT NULL,
  work_order_id INT,
  failure_code VARCHAR(50),
  failure_type ENUM('breakdown','degradation','intermittent','planned_stop') DEFAULT 'breakdown',
  severity ENUM('minor','moderate','major','critical') DEFAULT 'moderate',
  description TEXT,
  failure_start_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  failure_end_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  repair_start_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  repair_end_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  downtime_duration INT,
  repair_duration INT,
  waiting_duration INT,
  root_cause_category ENUM('mechanical','electrical','software','operator_error','wear','environmental','unknown') DEFAULT 'unknown',
  root_cause TEXT,
  resolution_type ENUM('repair','replace','adjust','reset','other') DEFAULT 'repair',
  resolution TEXT,
  previous_failure_id INT,
  time_since_previous_failure DECIMAL(12,2),
  reported_by INT,
  verified_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_failure_target (target_type, target_id),
  INDEX idx_failure_work_order (work_order_id),
  INDEX idx_failure_start (failure_start_at),
  INDEX idx_failure_type (failure_type),
  INDEX idx_failure_severity (severity)
);

  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  category ENUM('machine','equipment','building','zone','furniture','custom') DEFAULT 'machine',

  default_rotation_y DECIMAL(10,4) DEFAULT 0,

  bounding_box_height DECIMAL(10,4),

  INDEX idx_3d_model_public (is_public)

-- IoT 3D Model Instances
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_3d_model_instances (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  model_id INT NOT NULL,
  floor_plan_3d_id INT NOT NULL,
  device_id INT,
  machine_id INT,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  position_x DECIMAL(10,4) NOT NULL,
  position_y DECIMAL(10,4) NOT NULL,
  position_z DECIMAL(10,4) NOT NULL,
  rotation_x DECIMAL(10,4) DEFAULT 0,
  rotation_y DECIMAL(10,4) DEFAULT 0,
  rotation_z DECIMAL(10,4) DEFAULT 0,
  scale_x DECIMAL(10,4) DEFAULT 1.0000,
  scale_y DECIMAL(10,4) DEFAULT 1.0000,
  scale_z DECIMAL(10,4) DEFAULT 1.0000,
  visible TINYINT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  opacity DECIMAL(3,2) DEFAULT 1.00,
  wireframe TINYINT DEFAULT 0,
  cast_shadow TINYINT DEFAULT 1,
  receive_shadow TINYINT DEFAULT 1,
  clickable TINYINT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  tooltip VARCHAR(255),
  popup_content TEXT,
  animation_enabled TINYINT DEFAULT 0,
  animation_type ENUM('none','rotate','pulse','bounce','custom') DEFAULT 'none',
  animation_speed DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 1.00,
  metadata JSON,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_3d_instance_model (model_id),
  INDEX idx_3d_instance_floor (floor_plan_3d_id),
  INDEX idx_3d_instance_device (device_id),
  INDEX idx_3d_instance_machine (machine_id)
);

-- IoT Technician Notification Preferences
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_technician_notification_prefs (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  technician_id INT NOT NULL,
  push_enabled TINYINT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  push_token TEXT,
  push_platform ENUM('web','android','ios') DEFAULT 'web',
  sms_enabled TINYINT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  phone_number VARCHAR(20),
  phone_country_code VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT '+84',
  email_enabled TINYINT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100),
  notify_new_work_order TINYINT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  notify_assigned TINYINT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  notify_status_change TINYINT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  notify_due_soon TINYINT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  notify_overdue TINYINT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  notify_comment TINYINT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  min_priority_for_push ENUM('low','medium','high','critical') DEFAULT 'medium',
  min_priority_for_sms ENUM('low','medium','high','critical') DEFAULT 'high',
  quiet_hours_enabled TINYINT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  quiet_hours_start VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT '22:00',
  quiet_hours_end VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT '07:00',
  last_push_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  last_sms_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  last_email_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_notif_pref_technician (technician_id)
);

-- IoT Work Order Notifications
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_work_order_notifications (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  work_order_id INT NOT NULL,
  technician_id INT NOT NULL,
  notification_type ENUM('new_work_order','assigned','status_change','due_soon','overdue','comment','escalation') NOT NULL,
  channel ENUM('push','sms','email') NOT NULL,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  message TEXT NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('pending','sent','delivered','failed','read') DEFAULT 'pending',
  sent_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  delivered_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  read_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  failed_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  failure_reason TEXT,
  external_message_id VARCHAR(100),
  metadata JSON,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_wo_notif_work_order (work_order_id),
  INDEX idx_wo_notif_technician (technician_id),
  INDEX idx_wo_notif_status (status),
  INDEX idx_wo_notif_type (notification_type),
  INDEX idx_wo_notif_created (created_at)
);

-- IoT SMS Config
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_sms_config (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  provider ENUM('twilio','nexmo','aws_sns') DEFAULT 'twilio',
  account_sid VARCHAR(100),
  auth_token VARCHAR(100),
  from_number VARCHAR(20),
  max_sms_per_day INT DEFAULT 100,
  max_sms_per_hour INT DEFAULT 20,
  cooldown_minutes INT DEFAULT 5,
  is_enabled TINYINT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  last_tested_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  test_result TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

-- IoT Push Config
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_push_config (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  provider ENUM('firebase','onesignal','pusher') DEFAULT 'firebase',
  project_id VARCHAR(100),
  server_key TEXT,
  vapid_public_key TEXT,
  vapid_private_key TEXT,
  is_enabled TINYINT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  last_tested_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  test_result TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

-- IoT MTTR/MTBF Statistics
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_mttr_mtbf_stats (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  target_type ENUM('device','machine','production_line') NOT NULL,
  target_id INT NOT NULL,
  period_type ENUM('daily','weekly','monthly','quarterly','yearly') NOT NULL,
  period_start TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  period_end TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  mttr DECIMAL(10,2),
  mttr_min DECIMAL(10,2),
  mttr_max DECIMAL(10,2),
  mttr_std_dev DECIMAL(10,2),
  mtbf DECIMAL(12,2),
  mtbf_min DECIMAL(12,2),
  mtbf_max DECIMAL(12,2),
  mtbf_std_dev DECIMAL(12,2),
  mttf DECIMAL(12,2),
  availability DECIMAL(5,4),
  total_failures INT DEFAULT 0,
  total_repairs INT DEFAULT 0,
  total_downtime_minutes INT DEFAULT 0,
  total_uptime_hours DECIMAL(12,2) DEFAULT 0,
  corrective_work_orders INT DEFAULT 0,
  preventive_work_orders INT DEFAULT 0,
  predictive_work_orders INT DEFAULT 0,
  emergency_work_orders INT DEFAULT 0,
  total_labor_cost DECIMAL(12,2) DEFAULT 0,
  total_parts_cost DECIMAL(12,2) DEFAULT 0,
  total_maintenance_cost DECIMAL(12,2) DEFAULT 0,
  calculated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_mttr_mtbf_target (target_type, target_id),
  INDEX idx_mttr_mtbf_period (period_type, period_start),
  INDEX idx_mttr_mtbf_calculated (calculated_at)
);

-- IoT Failure Events
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_failure_events (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  target_type ENUM('device','machine','production_line') NOT NULL,
  target_id INT NOT NULL,
  work_order_id INT,
  failure_code VARCHAR(50),
  failure_type ENUM('breakdown','degradation','intermittent','planned_stop') DEFAULT 'breakdown',
  severity ENUM('minor','moderate','major','critical') DEFAULT 'moderate',
  description TEXT,
  failure_start_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  failure_end_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  repair_start_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  repair_end_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  downtime_duration INT,
  repair_duration INT,
  waiting_duration INT,
  root_cause_category ENUM('mechanical','electrical','software','operator_error','wear','environmental','unknown') DEFAULT 'unknown',
  root_cause TEXT,
  resolution_type ENUM('repair','replace','adjust','reset','other') DEFAULT 'repair',
  resolution TEXT,
  previous_failure_id INT,
  time_since_previous_failure DECIMAL(12,2),
  reported_by INT,
  verified_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_failure_target (target_type, target_id),
  INDEX idx_failure_work_order (work_order_id),
  INDEX idx_failure_start (failure_start_at),
  INDEX idx_failure_type (failure_type),
  INDEX idx_failure_severity (severity)
);
